nodes.text: Between 3 ABY and 4 ABY. the Auction for Han Solo was hosted by the criminal syndicate Crimson Dawn on the planet Jekara for the carbonite encased rebel smuggler Han Solo after it stole Solo from the bounty hunter Boba Fett on the moon Nar Shaddaa. Crimson Dawn's leader, Lady Qi'ra, intended to use the auction to allow the great galactic powers witness the return of the Dawn, which many believed had disappeared, though in reality they had been planning something big to announce their return.

Among the factions invited to the auction was Black Sun, who were represented by Lord Gyuti, the Galactic Empire, represented by Sub-Administrator Sly Moore, who was also attempting to capture Solo for the Sith Lord Darth Vader the Hutt Clan, who were represented by the Grand Hutt Council, and the Unbroken Clan led by General Vukorah. The Rebel Alliance became aware of the auction thanks to Amilyn Holdo, and Leia Organa, Lando Calrissian, and Chewbacca traveled to Jekara to rescue Solo.

Once the auction began, multiple bids were placed for Solo, with Jabba Desilijic Tiure ultimately winning possession of the smuggler for one million credits. Just as Jabba was intending to leave Jekara, however, Vader arrived at the auction, claiming that Solo was his.
